title: Routes
description: a list of routes from a connector

min_message_window.description: the minimum difference (in seconds) between the source and destination transfers' expiries

destination_account.description: the connector's account on destination_ledger; (this property is only for local routes)

points.description: a list of points describing the exchange rate curve

paths.description: a list of alternative paths from nextLedger and destinationLedger (each path being a list of ledgers)
